libraries.name: acmetool
libraries.description: :lock: acmetool, an automatic certificate acquisition tool for ACME (Let's Encrypt)

libraries.name: themis
libraries.description: Easy to use cryptographic framework for data protection: secure messaging with forward secrecy and secure data storage. Has unified APIs across 14 platforms.

libraries.name: acra
libraries.description: Database security suite. Database proxy with field-level encryption, search through encrypted data, SQL injections prevention, intrusion detection, honeypots. Supports client-side and proxy-side ("transparent") encryption. SQL, NoSQL.

libraries.name: nacl
libraries.description: Pure Go implementation of the NaCL set of API's

libraries.name: go-password-validator
libraries.description: Validate the Strength of a Password in Go

libraries.description: ðŸŒ°  encrypt/decrypt using ssh keys

libraries.name: optimus-go
libraries.description: ID hashing and Obfuscation using Knuth's Algorithm

libraries.name: go-yara
libraries.description: Go bindings for YARA

libraries.name: firewalld-rest
libraries.description: A rest application to update firewalld rules on a linux server

libraries.name: badactor
libraries.description: BadActor.org An in-memory application driven jailer written in Go

libraries.name: passlib
libraries.description: :key: Idiotproof golang password validation library inspired by Python's passlib

libraries.name: simple-scrypt
libraries.description: A convenience library for generating, comparing and inspecting password hashes using the scrypt KDF in Go ðŸ”‘

libraries.name: argon2pw
libraries.description: Argon2 password hashing package for go with constant time hash comparison

libraries.name: goSecretBoxPassword
libraries.description: A probably paranoid Golang utility library for securely hashing and encrypting passwords based on the Dropbox method. This implementation uses Blake2b, Scrypt and XSalsa20-Poly1305 (via NaCl SecretBox) to create secure password hashes that are also encrypted using a master passphrase.

libraries.name: go-generate-password
libraries.description: Password generator written in Golang, usable as a CLI or Go library. Provides options for human readable and accessibility friendly passwords.

libraries.name: certificates
libraries.description: An opinionated helper for generating tls certificates

libraries.name: secureio
libraries.description: An easy-to-use XChaCha20-encryption wrapper for io.ReadWriteCloser (even lossy UDP) using ECDH key exchange algorithm, ED25519 signatures and Blake3+Poly1305 checksums/message-authentication for Go (golang). Also a multiplexer.

libraries.name: sslmgr
libraries.description: A layer of abstraction the around acme/autocert certificate manager (Golang)

libraries.name: argon2-hashing
libraries.description: A light package for generating and comparing password hashing with argon2 in Go

libraries.name: goArgonPass
libraries.description: goArgonPass is a Argon2 Password utility package for Go using the crypto library package Argon2 designed to be compatible with Passlib for Python and Argon2 PHP. Argon2 was the winner of the most recent Password Hashing Competition. This is designed for use anywhere password hashing and verification might be needed and is intended to replace implementations using bcrypt or Scrypt.
